content: How do you handle it when the opportunity scope for returns is so staggering that most investors accessible through your network get intimidated and shut down? We often hear things like “I know you’re going to make this happen but it’s so big that it scares the shit out of me” or “We’d love to be a part of it but we’re concerned that we can’t take you as far as you need to go, you need an A+ VC team to make the most of this” and things like that, but you don’t have a network that connects into the A+ VC teams?
